title: IT IS PAY BACK TIME
author: Jude Nnam
source: Not listed on hymnary.org (contemporary Igbo liturgical hymn; verify with local sources)

sections.title: Verse 1
content: It is pay back time, give to God what is His,
Offerings and tithes with a joyful heart;
Sow into His kingdom, watch the blessings rise,
He will pour out grace, heaven’s open door.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: It is pay back time, give with faith and love,
For the Lord loves a cheerful giver;
Trust His promise, see the harvest grow,
Reaping joy from seeds you sow below.

sections.title: Verse 3
content: It is pay back time, lift your hands and sing,
Praise the Lord for all He’s done;
Thank Him for His mercy, thank Him for His grace,
Every blessing flows from His throne.
